name: Cleaning Squad
description:
This Game is being Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

You are the Commander of the so called "Cleaning Squad". You get hired to "cleanse" Buildings or complexes of dangerous Monsters/Anomalies. Your people may not be the most qualified, but at least their (mostly) willing to do the job.

If there is demand, I will make a full game out of this. After the Jam.

warning: mild blood
